All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AcademicInstitutionDAO
AcademicInstitutionDAO interface defines methods for interacting with the AcademicInstitution table in the database.
AcademicInstitutionDAOImpl
Implementation of the AcademicInstitutionDAO interface.
AcademicInstitutionDAOImplInvalidTest
Invalid test cases for the AcademicInstitutionDAOImpl class.
AcademicInstitutionDAOImplValidTest
Valid test cases for the AcademicInstitutionDAOImpl class.
AcademicInstitutionDTO
AcademicInstitutionDTO represents an academic institution in the system.
AcademicProfessionalDAO
AcademicProfessionalDAO interface defines methods for interacting with the AcademicProfessional table in the database.
AcademicProfessionalDAOImpl
Implementation of the AcademicProfessionalDAO interface.
AcademicProfessionalDAOImplInvalidTest
Test class for validating the functionality of the AcademicProfessionalDAOImpl class.
AcademicProfessionalDAOImplValidTest
Test class for validating the functionality of the AcademicProfessionalDAOImpl class.
AcademicProfessionalDTO
AcademicProfessionalDTO represents an academic professional in the system.
CourseDAO
CourseDAO interface defines methods for interacting with the Course table in the database.
CourseDAOImpl
Implementation of the CourseDAO interface.
CourseDAOImplInvalidTest
Invalid test cases for the CourseDAOImpl class.
CourseDAOImplValidTest
Valid test cases for the CourseDAOImpl class.
CourseDTO
CourseDTO represents a course offered by an institution in the system.
CourseServlet
CourseServlet handles course-related actions such as creating, updating, and deleting course listings.
DashboardServlet
DashboardServlet handles requests for the institution dashboard.
DBConnection
This class ensures that only one instance of a database connection is created and reused throughout the application.
DBConnectionInvalidTest
Ensures the Singleton instance and connection functionality of DBConnection.
DBConnectionValidTest
Ensures the Singleton instance and connection functionality of DBConnection.
LogoutServlet
LogoutServlet handles user logout by invalidating the session and redirecting to the login page.
ProfileServlet
ProfileServlet handles profile creation and redirection after user login.
RequestTeachResponseServlet
RequestTeachResponseServlet handles responses to teach requests from institutions.
RequestTeachServlet
RequestTeachServlet handles the creation of teach requests by academic professionals.
SearchServlet
SearchServlet handles search functionality for academic professionals to find courses based on various criteria.
TeachRequestDAO
TeachRequestDAO interface defines methods for interacting with the TeachRequest table in the database.
TeachRequestDAOImpl
Implementation of the TeachRequestDAO interface.
TeachRequestDAOImplInvalidTest
Invalid test cases for the TeachRequestDAOImpl class.
TeachRequestDAOImplValidTest
Valid test cases for the TeachRequestDAOImpl class.
TeachRequestDTO
TeachRequestDTO represents a request to teach a course by an academic professional.
UserDAO
UserDAO interface defines methods for interacting with the User table in the database.
UserDAOImpl
Implementation of the UserDAO interface.
UserDAOImplInvalidTest
Test class for validating the functionality of the UserDAOImpl class.
UserDAOImplValidTest
Test class for validating the functionality of the UserDAOImpl class.
UserDTO
UserDTO represents a user in the system.
UserServlet
UserServlet handles registration, login, and redirection flows.
